name: James A. D'ANGELO, Sr. and Carol D'Angelo, Petitioners v. JP MORGAN CHASE BANK NA, et al. and James A. D'Angelo, Jr. and Harry M. Anthony, Mortgage First Lending Group and Citizen Settlement Services, Inc. and Tonya Friend and Michelle Sheridan, Respondents
name_abbreviation: D'Angelo v. JP Morgan Chase Bank NA

parties: James A. D’ANGELO, Sr. and Carol D’Angelo, Petitioners v. JP MORGAN CHASE BANK NA, et al. and James A. D’Angelo, Jr. and Harry M. Anthony, Mortgage First Lending Group and Citizen Settlement Services, Inc. and Tonya Friend and Michelle Sheridan, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of June, 2013, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Application to File a Reply to the Answer are denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
69 A.3d 236
James A. D’ANGELO, Sr. and Carol D’Angelo, Petitioners v. JP MORGAN CHASE BANK NA, et al. and James A. D’Angelo, Jr. and Harry M. Anthony, Mortgage First Lending Group and Citizen Settlement Services, Inc. and Tonya Friend and Michelle Sheridan, Respondents.
Supreme Coui’t of Pennsylvania.
June 19, 2013.
